channel.title: Skill Tap
channel.description:
Well I'm sorry for creating another topic about this, but i couldn't bump my old topic anyway
This [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/330825-602-skill-interface-fixed-pi-dspk.html]Tutorial (Skilltap602)[/url] was added to my server, and i just have one problem: on the HP orb and the HP bar it shows my HP is going down when I get hit, but on my skill tab it does not show my lowered hp, it just says 99/99. Therefore when I eat, the food does nothing
Here's my Class: [url=http://pastebin.com/vbzCTaeL]RSInterface Class[/url] [url=http://up.ht/14eqEUF]Client Class[/url] (It's download link for my client Class)
Anyone can help me to fix this? :)
Thanks.

item.title: Skill Tap
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem

Well I’m sorry for creating another topic about this, but i couldn’t bump my old topic anyway
